name: Spade King
description:
It is a brand new free Video Poker game with infinite fun. All you need to do is simply clicking on the screen.

Press the “SWAP” button, and you may get a big prize! The more you play, the more rewards you will win! What are you waiting for? Download now and enjoy Spade King!

Gameplay features:
*Fast: collect the best five-card hand
*Prize: finish the paytable to win your prize.
